function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Work suspensions, shut downs, or slowdowns due to COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Project delays and financial losses","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide remote work options, and collaborate with project stakeholders to minimize disruptions","Technologies":"Remote work technology, project management software, and communication tools","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and stakeholders","Owner":"Project owners, construction companies, and governmental authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of on-site operations and increase in offsite construction","Impact":"Reduced control over contagious disease precautions and potential increase in transportation-related exposure","Mitigation":"Enhance offsite construction protocols, implement rigorous transportation safety measures, and monitor the health of offsite workers","Technologies":"Offsite construction technologies, telemedicine, and health monitoring devices","People":"Offsite construction workers, transportation personnel, and project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project owners, and transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Contracting at significantly lower margins and lack of in-depth investigation into bidding decisions","Impact":"Financial instability for contractors and increased risk of project quality compromise","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough financial analysis, negotiate transparent contracts, and invest in value engineering to offset lower margins","Technologies":"Financial analysis tools, contract management software, and value engineering software","People":"Contractors, project managers, and financial analysts","Owner":"Construction companies, project owners, and financial institutions"}]}
